DOC.brief_summary: To determine if Tetrix Cream, when applied to the skin lesions on patients with contact dermatitis, improves the symptoms of burning and itching.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Tetrix on Alleviation of Burning,Itching Associated With Lesions of Contact Dermatitis
DOC.criteria: 1. Normal subjects with sensitivity to nickel 2. Subjects with hand eczema under 18 years of age
DOC.keyword: Tetrix cream, contact dermatitis, effect on burning and itching
